title: Helicone: An Open-Source Datadog Alternative for LLM Observability
title1: Helicone: An Open-Source Datadog Alternative for LLM Observability
title2: Helicone: An Open-Source Datadog Alternative for LLM Observability
description: Datadog has long been a favourite among developers for its application monitoring and observability capabilities. But recently, LLM developers have been exploring open-source observability options. Why? We have some answers.
author: Lina Lam
